algorithm_technique: Iterate through the array, keeping track of the minimum element seen so far and the maximum difference.
problem_summary_simple: Find the largest difference between two numbers in an array where the second number appears after the first and is larger.
problem_summary_technical: Iterate through the array, maintaining the minimum element encountered. Calculate the difference between the current element and the minimum, updating the maximum difference found.
key_insights: The problem can be solved in a single pass by keeping track of the minimum element seen so far.
Initialize the minimum to infinity and the result to 0 (or -1 if no valid pair exists).
